Name: Dice 1000 online
About the game: This game is a simulator of a board game. The main target of the game is to get 1000 points. A player rolls 5 bones (dice) and collects points. Look at screenshots to find out rules of the game. The game provides: - playing online with a computer or a real person - regulations of the game are available inside the client ( see game official website as well ) - mouse control (except login part) - check how lucky is your day today - balanced rules - Latency or ping does not influence on quality of gameplay. - Hints: - If your opponent has 750 and you have 0 do not be upset much, because there are 3 barrels that must to pass your opponent. Android
